alert.note: Alert for Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 22 at 7:41PM MST until February 24 at 12:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST FRIDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains. * WHEN...Until Noon MST Friday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty north to east winds through the overnight hours tonight may cause areas of blowing snow and reduced visibility, mainly over mountain passes like Bozeman Pass.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains
